title: Vaccination Resources
cleaned_text: The following vaccination resources include information and tools that healthcare providers can use in their practices and share with their staff and colleagues. [Vaccination Guidelines](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/for-healthcare-providers/vaccine-resources/guidelines/) - Links to the Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices (ACIP) General Best Practice Guidelines for Immunization and current Childhood and Adult Immunization Schedules [Vaccine Information Statements (VISs) ](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/for-healthcare-providers/vaccine-resources/vaccine-information-statements/)- Information about the use of VISs, links to VISs for routinely administered vaccines, and VIS translations [Vaccine Storage and Handling](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/for-healthcare-providers/vaccine-resources/vaccine-storage-and-handling/) - Links to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommendations and guidelines for vaccine storage and handling, and Immunization Action Coalition resources and checklists [Vaccine Safety](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/for-healthcare-providers/vaccine-resources/vaccine-safety/) - Information on vaccine safety and reporting adverse events [Hawaii Immunization Registry (HIR) ](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/about-us/programs/hawaii-immunization-registry-hir/)- Information about HIR and Meaningful Use reporting for Eligible Professionals and Eligible Hospitals and/or Critical Access Hospitals [Vaccines for Children (VFC) Program: Information for Healthcare Providers](https://health.hawaii.gov/docd/for-healthcare-providers/vaccination-resources/vaccines-for-children-program-vfc/) - News and updates from the Hawaii VFC program, upcoming and archived educational opportunities, and frequently asked questions from providers Last reviewed April 2019
